entities.name: Avatar
entities.description:
The Avatar component is used to represent a user.

It displays a profile picture, or falls back to the user's initials
if a profile pic is not provided.

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: basic usage
border: normal
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
<span class="drac-avatar drac-bg-green-transparent drac-text-green drac-avatar"
  ><span color="white" class="drac-text drac-text drac-text drac-text-white"
    >NF</span
  ></span
>

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: border: large
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
<span
  class="drac-avatar drac-bg-green-transparent drac-text-green drac-avatar drac-avatar-lg-stroke"
  ><span color="white" class="drac-text drac-text drac-text drac-text-white"
    >NF</span
  ></span
>

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: border: none
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html:
<span
  class="drac-avatar drac-bg-green-transparent drac-text-green drac-avatar drac-avatar-no-border"
  ><span color="white" class="drac-text drac-text drac-text drac-text-white"
    >NF</span
  ></span
>

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: Custom variants
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html: NFZR
ext_com_draculaui_variations.docs: Avatars accept multiple variants, like in the example below...

ext_com_draculaui_variations.title: Custom colors
ext_com_draculaui_variations.html: NFNF
ext_com_draculaui_variations.docs: Avatars accept colors, like in the example below...

title.description: The title or name to be used in the avatar.
title.name: title

themeColor.description:
The theme color for the avatar.
This property controls the border and glow colors for the component.
themeColor.name: themeColor

variant.description:
The variant property allows for consumers to choose from
a regular avatar, or a subtle variation.
variant.name: variant

borderVariant.description:
Allows for controlling the border of the avatar.
`large` -> to use a thicker border.
`none` -> hides the border.
borderVariant.name: borderVariant

src.description: Sets the source for the profile picture.
src.name: src
